Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/Monitor
Synopsis Monitor the progress of a job.
Usage import util::Monitor;
Details startJob event todo endJob
Description The Monitor library provides functionality to show the progress of a job. A job is an amount of work that has a name, is explicitly started (using startJob) and continues until it is explicitly ended (using endJob).

Optionally, the amount of work to be done or that has been completed can be specified in order to give better progress estimations to the user.

The following functions are provided:
  • startJob: Log the start of a job.
  • event: Log the start of an event (it is ended by another event or by endJob).
  • todo: Set the estimated remaining work for the current (sub)job.
  • endJob: Log the end of a job.
